# {{ site.name }}

> {{ site.description }}

I'm a software engineer passionate about Geographic Information Systems (GIS), cloud infrastructure, data visualization, and open source development. This blog documents my technical explorations, projects, and insights gained from working with mapping data, cloud platforms, and developer tools.

{% endfor %}
